Header.title: NGO Marketplace Name
Header.paragraph: Platform for NGOs and women to sell their unique products

Why: Provides NGOs a platform to sell their unique & handmade products
Promotes Made in India ans Supports Poor Artisans
Empowers and Inspires Women to be Independent

Testimonials.text: Works like a charm. I love the ease of the website and would highly recommend purchasing from the site.
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: I didn’t even know from where to start from as far as the advertising and the reach to general mass is concerned Team Dot as really outdone itself. The interface of the site is so easy to navigate through and the very user friendly.
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe

Testimonials.text: At first I wasn’t sure of the reach my product will be able to create but with the confidence instilled in me and the trust shown by Team Dot, the product made an enormous profit and helped me inspire people around me.
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: I have always been a collector of art and recently have been discovering the traditional art of India but finding everything at one place was a real task and also doing my bit of good for the society while at it. Team Dot made it possible for me…
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe

Testimonials.text: We didn’t have a solution to list out all our products at a place but by this platform created by  Team Dot is the perfect solution for all our problems.
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: Since we started listing out items on the website there has been a 30% rise in our sales. Thank you Team Dot for being the voice of us and help us creating the mark.
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe
